body: Welp, the bad guys turned from somewhat guys who only likes to get b*tches on the beach to full on NTR douchebags. Author should've ended everything on the inn. Now it's becoming somewhat boring because you kinda know what will happen next since the author decided to go the typical NTR route.

this series is starting to get a bit stale. the art is good, but there's no progression and the non sex parts serve basically no purpose.

i hope the husband caught his wife making love with this guy 
its gonna be nice
@goodguy0177 more like bitchiru lol. Don't get me wrong tho I love her too, just in a different way.
shut up haters, I love mommychiru.

It took the author more or less a month for 5 pages, in which she is only getting her cheeks clapped in one, not even ankoman is this lazy, lol. Also, can they just DP her already? If your whole series revolves around a single girl getting fucked by two dudes (even kids in the side story) but they always take turns you might as well just make it a single guy.
Sigh.....,as always we are left with honey on our lips
I really want to know what she was saying/thinkinf in the room scene, we need some translation, im dying
This series is shit

Instead of... Idk... Investing in scenes that would actually make the story better, the author decided to waste half of page 57 to draw the douchebag showing up at her door... I don't see that as a tease of a legit sequel (part 3). If anything, that's just gonna be like a .5 bullshit to prolong the series. It's not even fun anymore, it's irritating. At least the first one got her fucked at the tent infront of her husband or smthg (which is kinda dumb but that's pretty hot). Now she's just gonna get fucked in the apartment? What difference does that have with the previous .5 stuffs? If it weren't for the art I would give this shit a negative. But well.. this is a 4/10. Such wasted potential.

And third, wasn't her husband speculating tht something was off with how his wife took an unusually long time to wash on page 46? How in the world did he ended up hitting the hay peacefully with their son WHEN HIS WIFE IS GONE THE WHOLE TIME THEY WERE IN THE RESORT? I MEAN THEY JUST MET HER AGAIN IN THE MORNING WHEN SHE WOKE UP FOR GOD'S SAKE. THEY DIDN'T EVEN BOTHER TO ASK WHERE THE FUCK WAS SHE THE WHOLE TIME? ALL THESE TIME WAITING EVERY END OF THE MONTH AND WE GOT THIS KIND OF ENDING? WHAT THE ACTUAL FUCK.

Okay, since this seems sort of done I just want to point out a lot of plot holes in this manga. First, how can the husband not know that it's his wife getting railed in the hot springs when she was moaning and screaming on page 30? Second, she didn't black out or anything after getting fucked in the bathroom let alone showed any signs that she's asleep/hallucinating that her son is calling her/in a dream sequence or anything and suddenly she's waking up in her bed after fucking those douchebags? Like.. how the fuck did she return? I bet she didn't even know where her family's room is cuz she came off as a dumb airhead right from the start. This part feels so abrupt, like it's letting her get away with it IN THE WORST WAY POSSIBLE.
Now I can’t wait for more.. pls release it faster. lol
Sigh......

@xyst16 I have to agree, how long was this second part releasing for, nearly 1.5 years? For 58 pages? That's one page every 9 days, there's a leisurely pace, and then there's this "I'm trying to milk this for as long as possible." pace. I also just hope if they ever continue this series they decide to draw some double penetration or spitroasting if she's going to keep getting double teamed/gangbanged in the future, too many missed opportunities in this one. 2 dudes with 1 girl and they only ever draw her with one guy at a time, like why even make it a point to show she's with 2 guys then if it's effectively 1 on 1 sex scenes 95% of the time? The story is extremely cookie cutter, so they could have bothered spicing up the sex scenes a little like that.
